data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hamada, Neusa, Pepinelli, Mateus, Hernández, Luis M. (2006): Simulium nunesdemelloi (Diptera: Simuliidae), a new species of black fly from the northwestern region of Amazonas State, Brazil. Zootaxa 1371: 23-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273647
